overview: For 50 years, locals and tourists from around the globe have flocked to San Francisco's legendary Nob Hill Theatre to see, and touch, their favorite gay adult entertainers. In 2018, owners Larry and Gary decided it was time for a change of scenery. Follow the promiscuous Larry, husband Gary and the sex-hungry staff as they prepare for the theatre's grand finale event - a LIVE, double penetration three-way! Acrobatic sex, glory holes and plenty of nostalgia. NakedSword & the Nob Hill Theatre invite you to 'touch our junk' one last time.
title: Nob Hill
